Thu Dec 28 03:13:44 PM UTC 2023
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/bin
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/bin/libpng16-config /opt/bin/libpng16-config
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/bin/libpng-config /opt/bin/libpng-config
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/bin/pngfix /opt/bin/pngfix
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/bin/png-fix-itxt /opt/bin/png-fix-itxt
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/include
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/include/libpng16
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/pnglibconf.h /opt/include/pnglibconf.h
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/png.h /opt/include/png.h
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/libpng16/pnglibconf.h /opt/include/libpng16/pnglibconf.h
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/libpng16/png.h /opt/include/libpng16/png.h
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/libpng16/pngconf.h /opt/include/libpng16/pngconf.h
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/pngconf.h /opt/include/pngconf.h
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib/pkgconfig
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng16.la /opt/lib/libpng16.la
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng16.so.16 /opt/lib/libpng16.so.16
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng.la /opt/lib/libpng.la
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng16.so.16.40.0 /opt/lib/libpng16.so.16.40.0
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng16.so /opt/lib/libpng16.so
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/pkgconfig/libpng16.pc /opt/lib/pkgconfig/libpng16.pc
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/pkgconfig/libpng.pc /opt/lib/pkgconfig/libpng.pc
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng.so /opt/lib/libpng.so
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/man
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man5
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man3
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/share/man/man5/png.5 /opt/share/man/man5/png.5
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/share/man/man3/libpngpf.3 /opt/share/man/man3/libpngpf.3
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/share/man/man3/libpng.3 /opt/share/man/man3/libpng.3
